column1: overpitched just outside off, and Brathwaite shoulders his arms to the Test's first ball
full and wide outside off. The ball shapes further away, and Brathwaite lets it go through to the keeper
full outside off once more. Brathwaite gets to the pitch of the ball and then shoulders his arms
length ball on off, and shaping away from the batsman. Brathwaite shuffles across to cover his off stump, but shoulders his arms thereafter
full on leg stump this time. Brathwaite must play at it on this occasion, and he taps it to the leg side with soft hands
overpitched outside off and the batsman tries to drive past the bowler. It's too full, and therefore Brathwaite can't get under the pitch of the ball. All he can do is mistime it back to Jayed
full on off, and almost gets a wicket first ball! Flicked off his pads to the leg side, and it goes straight to Haque at short leg. Hits his knee
full on off again, and Smith drives to midwicket for a single. First runs!
full outside off, with two slips in place. Brathwaite carefully drives to short mid off
full on middle, and Brathwaite tries to work it towards mid on. But the ball stops after pitching, and Brathwaite's through his flick too early. Takes a leading edge, but falls short of mid off
full outside off, and spinning away. He gets back to cut, but then pulls out of the shot
full on middle, and Smith defends it back to the bowler
full outside off,  and spins sharply away from the batsman. The ball takes some extra bounce, and then zips through between the keeper and first slip. Came off the keeper's gloves, I think!
tossed up outside off, but Smith gets to the pitch of the delivery this time. Plays a square drive to the infielder
flighted outside off, and Smith looks to free his arms. Drives uppishly and the ball flies off the outside edge. Falls just in front of Mushi at point
full outside off, and turns away from the batsman. He shoulders his arms
extra bounce! Lands outside off, but takes off after pitching. Sharply taken by the keeper from near his chest
full outside off, and driven to cover off the front foot
full outside off, and Brathwaite lets it go through to the keeper. No shot offered
full just outside off, and he plays with the turn to the off side. Stopped by short cover
full on middle, and Brathwaite gets to the pitch of the delivery. Pushes it straight back thereafter
full on off, and Brathwaite adjusts in his crease before defending
falls short of first slip! Pitched up outside off and he attempts the front-foot defense. The ball turns slightly, takes the outside edge, but doesn't carry to the cordon
length ball on off, and Brathwaite gets onto the back foot. Blocked
full outside off, and Smith sticks his bat out. Taps it away to the off side
flighted outside off. Pitches and spins away from Smith as he offers no shot
full outside off, and turning away from Smith. The keeper collects from wide outside off
flatter, and lands outside off. Smith rocks back to cut, but mistimes to point
extra air this time! Lands on off, and Smith attempts to drive through the covers. Can't find the meat of the bat
full on off, but gripping and spinning off the surface. Through to Liton once more
full outside off, and Brathwaite smothers this back to Shakib. Driven off the front foot, but with very soft hands
low full toss on middle, and Brathwaite finally manages to put something away. Uses his wrists to work it off his toes to deep midwicket
full on off, and driven to mid on
back of a length on middle, and a lot of bounce for Shakib! Surprises the batsman, as he works it to the leg side
length ball on middle, and Smith tiptoes to negate the extra bounce. Flicks to leg slip
very wide! Lands outside leg, and spins further away from the batsman. Liton has to scurry across to his right to hold on to the ball
full on middle, but spinning into the batsman. Brathwaite tries to nudge it square, but the ball goes down the leg side
full on leg stump, and spinning further down the leg side. Liton does well to ensure he manages to get his body behind the ball
flighted outside off, and he plays it with the spin past the non-striker. Driven to mid on
flighted on off, and worked with the angled bat to the leg side. Timed well, but midwicket's diving effort ensures they can't get a run
soft appeal! But no glove. Length ball on middle, and turning down the leg side
flat on middle, and going straight through this time. Brathwaite offers to pad it, and the ball hits his front leg. Impact's in front of leg stump, and definitely missing the stumps
full on leg, and Smith uses his feet! Skips forward, and drills a drive to mid on
full on middle, and straightening after pitching. Smith rocks back and fends off the back foot
extra air, and takes the edge! Lands short of the diving leg slip fielder. Landed on leg stump, and took the bat's outside edge as he looked to defend. Excellent effort from the fielder though
full just outside off. Brathwaite gets to the pitch of the ball and blocks with soft hands
full just outside off once again. Brathwaite fends it away past silly point
full on off, and Brathwaite digs it out of the blockhole. Intercepted by silly point once more

full on leg stump, and Smith mistimes the flick down the leg side. Takes the bat's outside edge, and pops up in the air. Short leg races backwards - with his helmet still on - and takes a catch from over his shoulder
length ball on off, and it darts right into the new batsman's pads. He needs to get his bat down in a hurry, and somehow manages to push it to the off side
tossed up on leg stump, and Brathwaite skips down the ground to convert it into a low full toss. Drills a drive to mid on
full on off, and spinning away from Powell. He comes down the wicket, but checks his shot at the last moment. Tapped back to the bowler
cut away! But hits silly point. It was a length ball outside off, and Powell had the opportunity to slap it to the boundary. Finds the fielder's thighs instead
length ball outside off, and left alone by Powell
full outside off, and Brathwaite tries to defend off the front foot. Silly mid off was preparing for a catch, but the batsman ensured he played at it with very soft hands
length ball on off, and defended off the front foot
pitched up on off, and Brathwaite tries to break the shackles! Winds up to hit this over the bowler, but mistimes it back to Shakib
length ball on off, and he gets onto the back foot on this occasion. Worked off his pads to the leg side
lands on off, and this time Brathwaite has enough time to whip it off the pads to deep midwickethttp://submit.espncricinfo.com/ci/content/submit/forms/feedback.html
length ball on off, and spinning across the batsman after pitching. Almost squared Brathwaite up, but he managed to get his bat behind the ball at the last moment

full on middle, and Powell uses his feet this time. Nudges it off his toes to deep midwicket, and the fielder must give it a chase. Manages to parry it back, but the batsmen have enough time to come back for a third
full on middle, and going straight through. Brathwaite misses the front foot defense, and the ball hits his front leg. They appeal in unison, but the umpire is not interested. Bat-pad perhaps.
full on leg, and spinning down leg. But Brathwaite's committed to the shot, so he checks a drive to the leg side
full on middle, and spinning across Powell. He gets onto the back foot, and fends it to the off side
length ball outside off, and Powell rocks back to cut hard! The bat turns in his hand, but still manages to play this fine between point and the slip cordon
full outside off, and Powell gets to the pitch of the ball to play an expansive drive. The bat turns once again, and the drive can only find the point fielder
full on middle, and Brathwaite gets to the pitch of the ball. Blocked back to the bowler
flat on off, and spinning away from the batsman after pitching. He had to shuffle across to the off side to block his off stump. Somehow manages to defend it away
full on leg, and he comes down the wicket. Blocks the ball back to Shakib thereafter
full on off, and angling into the batsman this time. Defended off the front foot

full outside off, and Brathwaite defends off the front foot. The ball hits the ground, but then hits the bat once again, and then pops into silly point's hands. Is that out? No, says the umpire. Interesting!
full on off, and defended off the front foot to see the over out
length ball outside off, and Powell looks to punch it through the covers. Mistimed to cover, but enough time to collect a single
length on leg stump, but spinning down leg. Brathwaite, however, has come down the wicket, so he must get bat to ball. Flicked to the leg side
slogged! Full on leg, and Brathwaite finally frees his arms. Gets to the pitch of the ball by skipping down the wicket, and then drives through the ball's line. Goes to the wide long-on boundary
full on middle stump, and Brathwaite's down on one knee. Defended
full on leg stump, but spinning down leg. Brathwaite's tempted to play at it, and he nudges it off his pads to the leg side. So close to leg slip!
full on leg stump, and Powell turns it off his pads to the leg side
full outside off, but spinning away from the batsman. He pokes at it, and taps the ball to point
full on off, and he gets onto the front foot this time. Blocked, but silly point dives and intercepts
full on off again, and the batsman misses the front-foot drive. Mistimed back to the bowler
full outside off, and Brathwaite offers his angled bat at this delivery. Defended to the off side
length outside off, and he tries to cut it square. Finds the fielder at point though
full outside off, and he tries to drive through the covers. Bangladesh, however, have been sharp. Short cover runs to his right and cleans up fast
full on middle, and Powell flicks this off his pads to backward square leg. Gets off strike
full on off, and Brathwaite's done blocking around. Uses his feet once again to dance down the wicket, and then lifts it over the non-striker! Delightful shot
tossed up on middle stump, and Brathwaite has almost yorked himself! Manages to block it away though
flighted outside off, and once again Brathwaite attempts to slog to the leg side. Mistimes it to mid on though
length ball outside off, and spinning away from the batsman. He rocks back, but offers no shot
full on off, and Brathwaite defends to short cover off the front foot
flat on middle, and Powell goes onto the back foot to get some extra time. Works it off his pads to midwicket thereafter

off short leg's helmet! But falls short of the fielder at regular slip. Oh, so close! It was full on leg stump, and Powell went for a slog sweep. Hit Mominul on the back of his head - flush - and was then in the air for a while. But slip couldn't change his direction in time, and therefore Powell survives. The doctor's checking for a concussion however
length ball on leg stump, and Powell defends off the back foot
flat on middle, and the ball straightens after pitching. Flicked to the leg side again
length ball on off, and punched away to cover
length ball outside off, and going straight through! Very close to the outside of off stump, as the batsman chooses to shoulder his arms
full on off, and spinning away from Powell! Perilously close to his outside edge as Powell attempts to defend off the back foot. Zips past, and into the keeper's gloves
length ball on middle, but angling down leg. The keeper intercepts
length on off, and angling into Powell's pads. Defended off the back foot
tossed up on middle, and Powell shuffles backward. Defended once again
tossed up outside off, and spinning away from Powell. He shoulders his arms
length ball outside off, and Powell turns it off his legs to deep midwicket. Enough time to take a couple
tossed up on off, and Brathwaite drives through the ball's line. Mistimes it, though, and finds the fielder at long on
flat and full on leg stump. Powell sticks his leg out, and pads it away to the on-side
full outside off, and Powell exposes all three stumps while attempting the sweep. The ball turns inwards, takes some extra bounce, and goes to the keeper from the top of leg stump!
length ball outside off, and he uses the depth of the crease to flick to deep backward square
full on off, and Brathwaite offers soft hands. Defended back to Taijul
full just outside off, but spinning away after pitching. Fended off the front foot to the off side
flat outside off, and too short from Mehidy. Powell gets onto the back foot, and crunches a pull through the mid-wicket region. Too easy
length ball outside off, and this time it's been punched to cover point off the back foot. Nice, early call for one
tossed up on middle, and Brathwaite gets down on one knee. Defended to the leg side
full outside leg, and flicked with the turn past leg slip. More runs for West Indies
length ball outside off, but spinning into Brathwaite. Uses his wrists to direct a nudge to leg slip
full outside off, and he opens his bat's face to drive. Played it between the gap between cover and point. Drinks
full outside off, and spinning away from Brathwaite. Left alone
full on middle stump. Brathwaite gets to the pitch of the ball and fends it back to Taijul
flat outside off, and cut off the back foot. No timing behind that shot, and the ball dribbles away to point
tossed up on off, and Brathwaite brings out the drive through mid off. Man in the deep though
full outside off, and spinning in sharply into the left-hander's pads. Powell uses the depth of the crease, and works it off his pads to deep midwicket
tossed up outside off, and spining away from Brathwaite. Left alone
length ball outside off, and he tries to punch at it. Takes the outside edge and falls just short of the diving second slip fielder!
back of a length on off, and Powell blocks off the back foot
full outside off, and Powell leans into a cover drive. Finds the infielder though
short! First time this game. Forces Powell to tiptoe and flick it to square leg. Played from near his armpit
back of a length on middle. Powell goes onto the back foot once more, and blocks it back to Kamrul
full outside off, and goes straight through to Nurul, the keeper. Powell shoulders his arms to see the over out.
fuller around off, blocked
slides into him and he turns it away to the on side

huge appeal for leg before but wonder why they were so excited. Actually they're going for the review, but hard to see this being given. Pitching around off and spinning in to hit the inner part of the back thigh. He had come down the ground and the direction of movement was outside off. Predictably, the impact is, too
very full outside off, carved away to the covers
back of a length, blocked
slides into him and he lifts his arms as the ball brushes the pad and trickles away to the fine leg region
length, straightens around middle and finds the outside of his bat as he plays from the crease
was there bat on that? Nope, just massive turn from a length as it rips past the outside edge and settles into the hands of wide slip
blocked down the pitch
tossed up and sliding down leg, tries to put it away and misses
makes room to a short one and cuts late through backward point
straightens and turns from middle as he looks to block and finds the outside of his bat
full, pushed out towards extra cover
length, no turn outside off, forces it out to point off the backfoot
length, spins in, tries to swat it away but keeps lower than anticipated
fullish length outside off, shuffles and blocks
full outside off, drilled hard through cover and point
full, not much time for it to turn, so it takes the outside of his bat as he blocks
flighted outside off, pushed down the pitch towards mid-on
comes down the ground and gets hit on the front pad as it angles and dips into him

that looks plumb, and yep, S Ravi raises the finger. They contemplate the review, but this one will be futile. And rightfully, Powell walks off. Comes on with the arm as he slides it in with a round-arm action from wide of the crease and pins him in front of middle
pats it away behind short leg
full outside off, driven through the gap at the extra cover region
non-turning length ball, shuffles and opens the face to tap through backward point
worked away to square leg
fights it up too much and sends down a full toss outside off that's whipped between mid-on and midwicket
full and flighted on middle, driven to cover
sliding fuller one, blocked
full, driven to sweeper cover for a brace
full and flighted outside off, driven to cover
length, spinning in, nudged to backward short leg
spins in from a length and gets an inside edge that misses the stumps
stays back and tries to whip it away but it comes on from a back of a length without turn and hits the back pad
blocked into the covers off the front foot
shuffles across to a length ball outside off
length, spinning in, tucked to short leg
pitched up around off, blocked down the pitch
full, flighted outside off, driven back
sliding on leg, blocked
length on middle, defended
flighted outside off, driven to the off side
full outside off, driven to long-off
length, spins in, tucked to short leg
flighted around off, squeezed out back to the bowler
length, minimally turns and he knocks it to the on side
full and flighted outside off, drilled back
length, no turn, shoulders arms as it slides in
full and pushed across, driven out to mid-off who is slightly back
pitched up outside off, squeezed out to long-off
floated up and sliding into leg, driven down the pitch
full outside off, blocked
flighted on off, driven to cover
short, straightening around off, cuts to point
flat back of a length outside off, punched to point
flat back of a length, whipped to the on side
spins in from a length and goes down the leg side
flighted around middle and did he rap him on the pad? Yes, but sliding down leg
tight lines on middle, bunted into the pitch
gets the foot towards the ball and it bounces and hits the pad as he tries to put it away
full on the stumps, defended
full on middle, driven to long-off
straightens from a length outside off as he lets it go
length, spins away, defended off the outside of the bat
full on middle and leg, driven down the ground
slides in and grabs the inside of the bat as he tries to block
full outside off, meets the pitch and drives through point
spinning in from a length, worked to midwicket off the backfoot
flighted outside off, drilled back
spins in and beats him on the inside edge as he presses forward to defend. Might have been heading down leg, and height could've been an issue too
full around off, drilled down the ground
full, worked to midwicket
non-turning length ball, shuffles and blocks
back of a length, stays back and punches towards long-on
full and sliding on leg, blocked
defended off the outside of the bat into the off side
full on middle, clipped to midwicket
full, comes in with the angle and driven off the inside of the bat to the bowler
length, turns away outside off, blocked
pushed to point
flighted and slid into leg, clipped to midwicket
slides in with the angle, works it behind square off the inside of the bat
stops on him and he's pressed forward early, chipped and nearly carries to cover
full and slid into leg, blocked
full on the stumps, and he keeps it out
full and angling in, clipped to midwicket
switches to the line outside off, blocked to cover
full outside off, reaches out and squeezes out an outside edge through the gap at the cordon
full outside off, pushed to mid-on for a rapid single
full, tailing away, left alone
length on off, blocked
full outside off, blocked
full outside off, shuffles and blocks
full on middle, blocked
full outside off, pushed to mid-off
spins down the leg side
back of a length, blocked
keeps his bat inside as this length ball whizzes past off-stump
fullish length, turned to midwicket
full, holding its line, left alone
straight outside off, no shot
full outside off, blocked
sticks his bat outside off and it nearly shaves the outside edge
full outside off, driven to long-on
full outside off, driven through cover
full outside off, driven through the left of cover
shuffles and blocks this length ball
pitched up outside off, too easy for Hope as he slashes it through extra cover
back of a length, tucked to midwicket
short of a length, nips away, arches back
full outside off, opens the face to the gully region
blocked towards mid-on
full, turned away with the angle to fine leg
short of a length, out of his reach and left alone
holds its line wide outside off, left alone
backs away to a short one and cuts to cover
leaves it as it straightens and goes perilously close to off stump
short, cut away through the gap at cover and point
short, cut to sweeper cover
full outside off, blocked
punched away through the on side
back of a length, keeps low, punched towards mid-on
full outside off, blocked
short and left alone outside off
full outside off, driven to extra cover
full, shapes away outside off, left alone
short, angled down the leg side
length on middle, blocked
full, blocked from the crease
full outside off, driven back
length, sliding on leg, nudged around the corner
short, cut to point
short of a length outside off, spins away and left alone
length, holding its line outside off, left alone
short of a length outside off, shuffles across and blocks
short, gets under it
short, gets over middle and off as he ducks
short, gets over leg side
full, swings away, left alone
short of a length, keeps low outside off, blocked
full and straight on off, blocked
short of a length, tucked to midwicket
short and wide, cut to deep backward point. Fifty for Brathwaite - the 18th of his career and second in a row
short of a length, blocked in front of off
length, gets a little big on him and shaves the outside edge before landing safely towards gully
full outside off, blocked
full outside off, pushed along to mid-off
full, angled in, raps the pad but heading down leg
length on off, punched towards mid-on and sets off for a quick single. He has a shy at the non-striker's end and there's no one backing up. Second fifty partnership in a row
full, dipping on the pads, clipped to square leg
short, gets under it
full outside off, squeezed out towards mid-off
full, clipped to deep backward square leg
full, pushed into the covers
good length around off, defended
short outside off, pulled to square leg
full outside off, squeezed out towards mid-off
pitched up on middle, drilled to mid-off
length around off, blocked
short, straightens outside off, backs away and forces a cut to point
pushed into cover off the front foot
bunted into the off side
full, shaping away, driven into cover
clipped off the pads to midwicket
full, clipped off the pads behind square
shuffles across to a length ball and blocks
full outside off, driven back
length outside off, shuffles and blocks
spins away from a length, left alone
advances down the ground and crunches a drive down the ground
spins away from a back of a length, now he cuts it late through backward point
full outside off, pushed to short cover
spins away from a back of a length, cut late through backward point
shapes to swat this back of a length delivery but the ball comes in with the angle and hits the pad
length ball outside off, and Hope punches this square off the back foot. The ball rolls away to the sweeper fielder for a single
short on off, and sends the batsman swaying away from the ball's line. Cramped the batsman for space, and Brathwaite did well to drop his hands on this delivery
length on off, and Brathwaite goes deep into his crease to defend
short on middle, and once again going over Brathwaite's shoulders. His slingy action forces the batsmen to second guess what length the bowler will land the ball in.
length ball on off, and angling away after pitching. Brathwaite sticks his bat out and taps it to point
goes short again! And Hope this time, ducks under the ball's line. Landed on middle stump on this occasion
length outside off, and spinning sharply away after pitching. Brathwaite stuck his bat out, and the ball takes the outside edge, eventually flying past first slip
full outside off, and driven square through the covers! Caressed, really, and wide long off needs to go chasing after it
full and wide outside off. He wants to sweep, so goes down on one knee, but the ball spins away from him, and therefore pulls out of his shot
just past the outside edge! Keeper appeals for stumping too, but the umpire's not interested. It was full outside off, and had forced the batsman to take a big stride forward
length ball outside off, and spinning away from Hope. Left alone
tossed up outside off, and once again gripping and turning away from the batsman. Sneaks through to the keeper's gloves once again
slower through the air, and lands on middle stump. The ball turns inwards, and Brathwaite flicks to the leg side
full on off, and spinning into the batsman. He shuffles across to the off side, and works it to the leg side
gloved! But lands short of short leg. Full on middle, and the batsman's attempted defense took the glove, hit his pad, and then fell to the leg side
tossed up just outside off,  and Brathwaite attempts the straight drive. Finds the bowler though
lands on off, and spinning into his pads. Worked off his legs to deep midwicket for a walking single
extra air, as it lands wide outside off. Brathwaite attempts to punch it through cover, but can't find the bat's sweet spot
full on off, and he takes a big stride forward to defend. Played back to the bowler
length ball on off, which straightens after pitching. Brathwaite makes room, and plays the late cut. Finds point though
length ball outside off, and he cuts this straight to cover point. Still calls early, and manages to rotate the strike
yorker on off, but Hope manages to squeeze a drive out. Finds the infielder though
length ball outside off, which straightens once again. Tapped back to Taijul off the back foot
flighted outside off, and Hope goes for the big drive through the covers. The bat turns in his hands, thereby slicing the shot, and the ball goes to point on the bounce
length ball on off, and he turns it off his pads to square leg
full on off, and defended off the front foot
length ball outside off, and Brathwaite rocks back to tap it back to the bowler
tossed up on off, and the offspinning delivery is worked away to the leg side
full outside off, and the front-foot defense takes the outside edge to third man

extra flight! And turning in sharply from outside off. Hope covers his off-stump and misses the back-foot defense. The ball hits him near the knee roll, and they appeal for lbw. Not given, but Bangladesh review. The replay shows that there's no bat involved, but impact's wide outside off, and the delivery would've missed all three stumps too. A review wasted
length ball outside off, and he waits on the back foot to play the perfect late cut. Slaps this past short third man for a couple more
full just outside off, and Hope takes a huge stride forward to meet the ball. Defends off the front foot, but the ball is edged to the off side
length ball outside off, and he mistimes a back-foot cut. The ball trickles away to cover point
full and wide outside off. it's spinning further away, but Brathwaite reaches out to drive. Finds cover
length ball outside off, but too close to his body for the cut. Left alone for Nurul

what turn! Full on off, but spinning away after pitching, and the batsman totally played down the wrong line. The defense takes a huge deflection off his back pad, and flies away to first slip. Taijul groans
tossed up outside off, and Brathwaite tries to slog towards the leg side. Comes off the bat's inside half, and trickles away to mid on
full on off, and spinning into his pads. Brathwaite carefully shuffles across, and flicks this fine to short fine leg
extra flight! Lands on a yorker-length in front of middle stump, and he does well to clip it off his toes to square leg
flat and full outside off. Brathwaite fends off the back foot
length ball outside off, and spinning into his body. Comfortably blocked off the back foot
tossed up on middle stump, and he carefully plays it to the leg side with soft hands. Mahmudullah was aiming at the stumps, but Brathwaite is a picture of concentration
full just outside off, and he defends off the front foot to covers

is that caught?! Hope's walking but the umpire will have a second look for sure. Full outside off, and the ball spun slightly away from Hope's attempted defense. Takes some extra bounce, hits him flush on the glove, and the ball goes towards silly point. There's no fielder there, so the keeper must run diagonally to his right, and he somehow manages to pocket this catch at full stretch to send the dangerous batsman back
length ball on off, and defended off the back foot
full on middle stump. He takes a big stride forward and defends back to Taijul
full and wide outside of stump. Hetmyer brings out the expansive cover drive, but the ball goes to the leg side instead
back of a length outside off, and this ball takes some extra bounce! Comfortably fended by the ball batsman though
full on middle stump, and turns sharply inwards. Brathwaite shuffles across to the off side, and flicks it off his pads to fine leg for a couple
full outside off, and defended back to the bowler
full just outside off, and spinning into the batsman's body. Flicked to midwicket on this occasion
full on off, and turning into Brathwaite. Nudged off his pads to square leg
full on leg stump, and Brathwaite comfortably collects a boundary. Swivels, makes some room, and then pulls this behind square to the boundary near fine leg
flighted, and landds full on off. Nudges this spinning delivery to square leg off his pads
full just outside off, and defended off the front foot. Intercepted by short midwicket
length ball outside off, but Hetmyer backs away to punch through cover. Finds mid off though
full on middle, and he comfortably whips it off his toes to deep midwicket. <b>Gets off the mark<b/>
length ball outside off, and this one straightens after pitching. Tries to cut, but it's too close to his body, and therefore Brathwaite tentatively plays it to short third man
full just outside off, and driven back to Taijul off the front foot
length ball outside off, and this one goes straight through to the keeper. Left alone
flies past the outside edge! Full outside off, and the defense takes the outside edge past first slip
tossed up, but wide outside off. Comfortably driven to cover, where a diving effort stops the single
full on leg stump, and Brathwaite pads this away with no shot offered
arm ball! Flat and straight on middle stump. Defended to the non-striker
tossed up outside off, and he sticks his bat out to defend. The ball takes the edge of the bat, and races away to the third-man boundary. Forces first slip to give it a chase
length ball on off, and he goes onto the back foot to drag a pull to deep midwicket. A couple for the new man in
lands on off, but skids through. Brathwaite fends off the back foot
length ball outside off, and that's been cut away off the back foot. No timing behind that shot, and point races to his right to intercept
quick! Lands on off, and skids through once more. Fended off the back foot
breaks the stumps! But not out. Full outside leg, and taken by the keeper from around the batsman's legs. Throws down the stumps, Nurul, but Brathwaite was always in
length ball outside off, and spinning further away. Left alone
full just outside off, and straightens after pitching. Left alone by Brathwaite. Maiden over
leading edge! But finds no fielder. Full on off, and his attempted leg-side slog takes the edge to point
full on middle, and Hetymer takes a big stride forward to defend
full on off stump. This time it's been firmly blocked off the bat's middle
full just outside off. Blocked off the front foot
uses his feet to get to this delivery. It was full on off, but Hetmyer was skipping down the ground in a flash
full on off, and once again, Hetmyer comes down the wicket to drive. Finds Mehidy though
full on off, and going straight into his pads. Brathwaite rocks back and blocks towards the non-striker
short and wide, and Brathwaite is quick to get into position for the cut. Finds the fielder at cover point. Team 150
length ball outside leg, and spinning further down leg. Nurul collects, and flicks the ball onto the stumps once again. Hetmyer's safe
misses everyone! Short on middle, but going down leg, and that's why Hetmyer attempts to pull. He misses, so does the keeper, and eventually so does leg slip
full toss on off stump, but Hetmyer was already through his drive. Comes off the bat's toe end, and the delivery rolls away to mid off
lands on off, but spins into middle stump. Hetmyer did try to cut, but eventually drags his shot back to the bowler
short outside off, and this has been slapped! Furiously hit to the cover-point boundary off the back foot
full on off, and he uses his feet to check-drive down the ground. Straight to long off
length ball on off, and Brathwaite works it off his pads to leg slip
length ball outside off, and the offspinning delivery is comfortably fended off the back foot
full on middle, but spinning sharply inwards this time. Brathwaite, however, manages to flick it fine down the leg side for a walking run
tossed up outside off, and that's been driven through the covers! Mushi goes chasing after it from cover point, but the batsmen manage to collect three. Time for tea!
short of a length, makes room and cuts it fiercely through point
full on middle and leg, clipped to deep square leg
back of a length, straightens outside off, cut to point
short of a length, straightens on off, blocked
leg side length ball, tucked away through fine leg
full outside off, pushed back off the front foot
full, tucked to short leg
length, spinning in, turned away past short leg
length, spinning in, blocked
non-turning length ball, shuffles and blocks
nudged to short leg
spins in from a length, beats the inside edge and goes over the stumps. Misses everything!
comes down the ground and pushes it to long-off
short of a length, spinning in towards off, punched through cover
back of a length, straightening, cut to deep point
back of a length, spins in, turned away to deep fine leg
advances down the ground and meets the pitch to crunch it through extra cover
pushed down the pitch
length, spins in, nudged into the on side
pitched up on off, turned away into the leg side

big outside edge, almost a chance. Might have grazed the fingertips as Liton Das flings himself to his left at first slip. Done in by the turn is Hetmyer as he goes for an expansive stroke and gets a big edge
advances down the ground and smothers the turn
almost comes down the ground and then lets it go but he had his backfoot rooted
back of a length, tucked to fine leg
length, spinning in, turned away to the on side
pitched up on middle and leg, pushed down the ground to long-on
length, spins away on off, carves it away to point
loopy fuller one, curves in on off, driven to the off side
back of a length, blocked to silly point
comes down the ground and blocks
full and spinning away, defended
full, driven through the covers
back of a length, punched off the backfoot to the bowler
full and spinning away outside off, defended
defended down the pitch
short of a length, whipped against the turn to midwicket
length, spinning in, gets an inside edge to square leg
length, spinning away around off, blocked
punched off the backfoot to sweeper cover
flighted on off, driven towards mid-on
pitched up on leg, driven to mid-on
length, spinning in, nudged past short leg
full, spinning in, flicked towards midwicket
length, minimal turn, bunted to short leg
fullish on middle, blocked
length, spinning in, nudged into the on side
back of a length, shapes away, sticks his bat out and gets beaten
again some sharp swing away, another swing and a miss
short outside off, shuffles across and blocks
fullish length outside off, defended
fullish and swinging away outside off, driven away through point
width on offer, opens up and chops it into the ground
length, spinning in, tucked away behind square
flighted on off, blocked
blocked off the outside of the bat as it spins away
pitched up on leg, gets down to sweep to deep backward square leg
pitched up outside off, crunched to mid-on
advances down the ground and hammers it past midwicket. Brute power - lots of bottom-handed power
length on the stumps, defended back
short of good length on middle, defended back
short, wide, slashes at it and sends it searing past backward point
short of good length, stands tall and whips it to midwicket
full on middle, clipped to midwicket
slides into leg, clipped to midwicket
length, spins away, stays in the crease and blocks
pitched up on leg and spinning away, turns and bounces in a big way and gets past everything
backs away to a length ball and tries to glide it behind square. Might've got an inside edge to the pad as Taijul belts out an appeal and the umpire stands unmoved
length, spinning in, blocked
advances down the ground and hammers this through mid-on and midwicket. Shellacks it with ample bottom-hand power
shuffles across and blocks a fuller one outside off
pitched up on leg, clipped away to square leg
advances down the ground and hammers this fuller one to mid-on
nudges this length ball away through backward point and jogs the single to complete his century. Second consecutive hundred and second of the series
short of a length, backs away and punches through cover
flights up a full toss, punched down to long-on
tries to nudge this one away with the angle but it slides in to graze the pad and trickle down to fine leg
length, turns away and keeps low, defended away
full, curving in on leg, blocked
full on middle and leg, blocked
length, spins away outside off, defended
full, driven back
extremely full outside off, squeezed out down the pitch
short of a length, backs away and punches into the covers
full on middle, defended
slides in with the arm and takes the inside of the bat to run behind square
turned away into the on side
overpitched just outside off, and Brathwaite is too late to play the drive. Off the bat's toe end
length ball outside off, and too close to his body for the cut. Mistimes the shot to the off side
length ball outside off, and this delivery is blocked off the back foot by Brathwaite. Played to cover
back of a length outside off, but jagging outwards after pitching. Brathwaite mistimes a pull to midwicket
good length outside off, and he rolls his wrists over this shot. Glanced - with the bat's open face - to deep point
full outside off, and swinging inwards. Hetmyer, however, drives off the front foot, and the ball is sliced away to the third-man boundary! Fifty for Hetymer
back of a length outside off, but the ball doesn't bounce as much! Brathwaite punches it away from his body to deep point for one
good length on middle, and that's been flicked off his hips to deep backward square. They jog back for a couple. Hundred partnership!
almost played on! Tries to chase a drive that's too wide outside off, and the ball takes an inside edge to fine leg instead
full just outside off. And defended off the back foot. Offers the full face of the bat
good length on middle, and that's been clipped off his pads to the gap near midwicket. Enough time to steal a single
overpitched outside off, and he manages to connect with a square drive past cover point. Chase for Liton, but he pulls it back from well side the boundary
length ball outside off, and that's been cut to the man in the deep off the back foot
inswinging yorker on off stump! Hetmyer does well to get his toes out of the way, and nudges it to midwicket
yorker on off stump once again, but this time Hetmyer manages to defend off the front foot. Played towards the non-striker
full outside off, and he goes to play the expansive drive. The ball's always moving away from him, so Hetmyer ends up over stretching. Goes just past his outside edge to the keeper
good length on off, and defended off the front foot to cover
full on middle, and turned off his pads to the leg side. Straight to midwicket

uses his feet first ball! Uses the spin and whips this off his legs to the cow-corner boundary. There was a fielder in the deep, but he closes the bat's face quite a bit, ensuring the ball stays very square

taken at midwicket! Tries to go for a big shot once again, but this time the slog finds the diving fielder. It was pitched outside off again, and Brathwaite tried to use the spin once more to fetch four runs. Big wicket!

tossed up first ball, and the ball goes between bat and pad! Misses the keeper's gloves too, and that'll be four byes. The ball landed outside off, and spun in very, very sharply. Could've easily clipped the top of middle stump on another day
full on off, and flicked to leg slip
lands on leg stump, and he manages to nudge it off his pads to midwicket. Gets off the mark too
back of a length on off, and Hetmyer makes room to try and cut. Mistimes a shot to cover point
overpitched outside off, and the ball shapes slightly away. Driven along the ground to cover
length ball on off, and angling across Hetmyer's body. Punched to point off the back foot
short outside off, but Hetmyer rides the bounce to defend off the back foot
pulled with disdain! Races away to the cow-corner boundary. Short outside off, and he was quick to get into position. Muscled for a boundary
full and wide, and shaping away from Hetmyer. He tries to play the square drive, but the bat was nowhere near the ball
full outside off, and the ball carries through nicely into Nurul's gloves
bat-pad! But falls in no man's land. Full on middle, and defended back to the bowler
full on middle, and he goes for a big sweep shot! Chase misses, and the ball hits the pad and lobs over leg slip
full on middle stump, and Hetymer has no trouble to nudge it to the vacant mid-wicket region for a single
full outside off, and spinning into Chase. Defended off the front foot

length ball on middle, and that's been comfortably worked off his pads to the fine-leg boundary. The man in the deep tries to flick it back with his legs, but he fails to, and instead crashes into the advertisement signs near the rope. Lucky he ain't hurt!
full just outside off, and that's been driven down the ground - with the spin - to long on. Chase'll keep strike
full on leg stump, and the ball sneaks past Chase's bat. Hits his front leg, but impact's outside leg
good length on middle, and he turns it off the back foot to midwicket
width offered outside off, and Hetmyer confidently goes onto the back foot to slap this ball to the boundary. Acres of space on the off side, and Hetmyer can choose his spot at the boundary
good length on off, but spinning into the batsman. Flicked to midwicket
length ball on middle, and turned off his pads to the leg side once more
tossed up on middle stump, and Chase gets forward to defend
good length outside off, and Hetmyer has no trouble in cutting it square to the man in the deep
good length on off, and Chase comfortably tucks it behind square for a single
good length outside off, but this one's angling into Hetmyer. Goes onto the back foot to punch it down to long off for a single
good length on off, and nudged off the back foot to midwicket
length ball on off, and Chase once again nudges it to the leg side off the back foot
outside off this time, and Chase fends towards short cover
good length outside off, but spinning into Hetmyer. Defended towards the on-side
fuller outside off, but the batsman just rocks backwards to get some extra time. Punched to cover
tossed up on middle, but Hetmyer smothers this behind square off the front foot. Uses his wrists to direct a tap to fine leg
good length on off, and he rocks back to punch to short mid off
full on off, and Chase winds up to go for a big shot. But he checks that intent, eventually defending back to the Bangladesh captain
tossed up again, but Chase takes on the challenge this time! Big back-lift and drilled through the covers
straight over the bowler's head! Controlled shot. Full on off, and simply lifted over Mehidy for the game's first six. Proper follow through too. A purist's delight
full on off, and he pushes at it off the front foot to cover for a quick single
full just outside off, and he drives to midwicket for a single
wild slap! But the slash is safe. Full and wide outside off, and Hetymer forces this over cover. In the air for a while, but way short of the man at deep extra cover
short and wide outside off, and Hetmyer cuts it off the back foot to deep point
full on middle and leg, and that's been worked off his pads to midwicket. Ninety overs done, but we're continuing.
good length outside off, and spinning into Hetymer. Fended towards midwicket
good length outside off, and cut away to deep point for a walking single
full on leg stump, and defended off the front foot to the leg side
good length outside off, but spinning away after landing. Chase punches - mistimed, really - to mid off
cut off the back foot to point
full just outside off, and he attempts to defend. Takes the outside edge, and first slip goes running behind it to stop the boundary

big appeal! But what are they appealing for? The bails are intact, the keeper isn't holding on to the ball, so was it for lbw? Who knows. The ball was full on off, hit his boot in front of middle stump, and then went into the keeper's gloves. Reckon that's going down though
full on off, and driven - inside out - to cover point
full outside off, but straightening after pitching. Hetymer played for the ball that's coming in, but the delivery didn't, and the ball sneaks past his outside edge
good length on middle, and Hetymer rocks back to tickle this fine down the leg side. Enough time to jog back for two
full outside off, and comfortably driven to cover
good length outside off, and Hetmyer strokes a cut to deep point for a single. Stumps!
short of a length outside off, turns it away behind square for one
short of a length on off, punched to cover
slight shape away from a length, left alone outside off
stands back and blocks this shortish one in front of off
back of a length, keeps a little low, moves across towards off and shoulders arms
length outside off, keeps it out off the outside of the bat
turned away through square leg for the fifty of the partnership
looped up outside off, defended to point
length on off, pushed back
spins away from a back of a length, stands tall and punches to cover
short of a length, spins away towards off, shuffles and whips into the on side
pitched up outside off, defended
short, cuts away outside off, swats it towards midwicket
breaks away from the cracks outside off, Hetmyer reaches out and slashes it out to the covers
back of a length, angled across, keeps a little low as he defends from the crease
good length ball that comes on in the corridor of uncertainty, Hetmyer sticks his bat out and a hint of subtle movement takes it past the outside edge

now has he nicked off there? Yup, he has. No maiden Test ton for Hetmyer as he can't get the bat out of the way of this short one outside off. An excellent line, too, as he's forced to stick his bat at it. Gets a clear edge that's taken by the keeper
short, cuts away outside off, slaps it to cover
back of a length, stays back and punches to cover
pitched up outside off, blocked
length ball, sliding into the pads, flicked away to backward square leg
turn outside off as he presses forward to block and gets beaten on the outside edge
fullish length around off, bunted off the front foot
full on the stumps, gets slightly opened up by the turn as he blocks it into the off side
shaping away and left alone outside off
short of a length outside off, punches through the point region
fullish, swings away sharply, not bothered with
short outside off, slapped to the left of extra cover
length around off, shuffles and blocks
left alone outside off
looped up outside off, hammers a drive straight to cover
length, slides in and catches him on the pad in front of leg. Would have missed it with the angle
fuller, pushed out towards mid-on
pitched up outside off, driven towards cover. 300 up for WI
gets down for a sweep and slides down the leg side to miss everything
full on off, driven to long-off

seemed close and given by umpire S Ravi. Chase contemplates the review with his partner and he goes for it. Could the angle have been too sharp? Let's see. Nothing on Ultra Edge as he tries to flick from off the pads. The ball thuds into the pad, might just take out enough of leg. Hitting the whole of leg stump, in fact. So review lost, and an early departure for Chase. West Indies six down
short of a length outside off, shuffles across and lets it go
sees some shape away and lifts his bat to let it go
full, too wide to be bothered with
back of a length, cuts in, defended close to the pads
fullish outside off, pushed towards point where it's cut off. A wicket-maiden for Jayed
length, straightens on off, blocked
spins away around off, blocked past silly point off the outside of the bat
floated up on middle and leg, clipped off the pads past the right of mid-on
too full on the stumps, ekes out a single past short leg
nicely done. Flights it up subtly and drags him forward and deceives him with length as it spins past the outside edge
back of a length, punched to cover
short, wide, slapped to cover
full on off, shuffles and blocks towards mid-on
full, swinging away, left alone
fullish length, holds its line, left alone
full outside off, leans forward and blocks into the covers
length, holds its line outside off, left alone
short of a length, sliding on, tries to swat it and gets hit on the high part of the pad
full outside off, blocked off the front foot
slides on with the arm and finds the inside of the bat as he blocks
short of a length, spinning away, keeps it down in front of the slip fielder
presses forward and eases into a defence into the off side
a streaky boundary. Off the outside as he attempts a flashy stroke away from his body
full outside off, shuffles and blocks
sprays it horribly down the leg side, Nurul does superbly to fling himself to his left and stop it
another off-target delivery, this one clips the pad on its way to fine leg
full outside off, pats it to point
back of a length, spins away, shuffles across and blocks
full and spinning away towards off, blocked
driven to cover
flashes hard and manages to keep the backfoot grounded as the keeper whips the bails off
length, spins away and goes past off stump
slides in and finds the inside of the bat as he presents a straight bat
full outside off, driven to cover
lures him forward with flight and hits the boot. Missing leg perhaps as the appeal is turned down
pushed to long-on
flighted outside off, defended with bat and pad close to each other
length, spinning in, tucked to backward square leg
full, driven back off the inside of the bat
shuffles and blocks a length ball
flighted on off, driven to mid-off who is slightly back

ah, gone! A bit of a juggle but a tame dismissal in the end. Full marks to the bowler, though. Slowing it through the air and looping it up to lure him forward. The angle makes it tempting for the batsman to flick against the line, and the ball spins away to grab the leading edge and lob to cover where Mehidy juggles and tumbles as he completes the catch at above chest height
swipes and misses. First ball in Test cricket and he picks the slog sweep. Barely survives as this skids past off stump
outside edge falls short of the lunging first slip fielder. Nice ball on a length spinning away from off stump
tossed up on off stump, tapped back uppishly towards the bowler
full on middle and he leans in to flick with the turn through midwicket
full on off stump, flicked to midwicket. He wasn't close to the ball there, big gap

got him? Seems to have got an inside edge on the forward defence and it's lobbed up for short leg who takes an easy catch. He has reviewed it though...it will not be overturned. Front on, it looked like it was only bat hitting pad as he pushed forward. But the ball has brushed glove on the way to the pad and he's gone. Nice loopy, dipping delivery drawing him forward and turning a long way. Keemo Paul hadn't been in a good position for a single ball he faced. His innings ends abruptly

...and he'll get it! Fourth five wicket haul for Mehidy in Tests. Angles on in at leg stump. Cummins follows the line and is beaten comprehensively on the outside edge. The ball catches his back thigh right in front of middle stump and there's little doubt about this
inside edge saves him as he pushes forward and cops one on the pad
length ball jumps up as he looks to block. Lands in the turf off his glove
bam. Such a sweet looking hit. Length ball on off stump and he uses his reach to golf-swing the hell out of this. Flat and to long-on's left
length on off stump, dead-batted into the pitch
length ball spinning away outside off, left alone...and Nurul has made a cheeky stumping appeal. Did Holder's back toe go up? It did, briefly, but it was back in quickly.

swung over long-on off the bottom of the bat. Length ball outside off and he got the front leg out of the way. He didn't get to the pitch of this as it was turning away but once again, those long limbs help him out. Floats over the fielder
chips but evades extra cover to his right. A static jab from Holder as this rose steeply outside off. Single at long-off
length ball outside off, and solidly blocked with the turn
length ball with a hint of away movement. Blocks it from the crease in front of off stump
full and slung in at leg stump, shuffles and clips into the midwicket region
crafty. The Jamaican crowd are amused! Kamrul's bouncer almost dies on Gabriel in the corridor and he gets on top and dabs it between second slip and gully. That will hurt the bowler...
bouncer at off stump again and he blocks it on the front foot. Every ball he plays is being cheered now
length and just outside off, blocked regally on the front foot
short in the corridor and comfortably defended into the covers
sways and misses. A wide length ball that keeps floating away. Holder can't connect on the cover drive. No feet.
full outside off, driven to deep extra cover
big appeal for lbw. Inside edge though. This nips back in from a length outside off
full ball wide outside off. Looks to clobber it through extra cover but it dribbles back down the pitch off the toe

another big appeal for lbw and this time Bangladesh challenge the not out decision. Jayed foxes him with a back-of-the-hand slower ball. It catches him full on the boot, but I suspect there's an edge on this...he's just managed to keep this a legal delivery. Half an inch behind the line......but that's hit him outside leg stump.
beats the inside edge. Length ball outside off, looks to drive through the line but he hasn't accounted for the zip inside
pulls off the front foot to deep square's left. Kamrul's short balls are not rising at all. This one dipping in the corridor as well as Holder went after it
full on off stump, driven down the long-off
length ball outside off, looks to punch on the up. Off the inside half into the leg side
thick outside edge and it's four at third man. Gabriel looks to cart this wide of mid-on but he hasn't got anywhere near it
offcutter, zips into his pad as he looks to block on the front foot
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
no mercy. Bangladesh's seamers are dishing out 125kph short balls. Holder gets half a stride into the leg side and swats this wide of long-on from outside off
overpitched outside off, glorious drive to find deep extra cover
drives on the up and gets it to extra cover on the bounce. Length ball wide outside off, arms thrown through the line gratefully
slower ball again but this time Gabriel picks it, albeit late. Loopy and just outside off. Chips it towards mid-off despite checking his short
picks the slower ball again and punishes him! This is ordinary bowling. Back-of-the-hand once more. Lobbed up with no hint of deceit and Gabriel lifts it over his partner

inside edge onto the stumps. A full pace length ball just outside off, with the seam pointed inwards. Angled bat from the No. 11 allows a contact with the edge because of that seam movement and he chops it on
gets him on the floor with a vicious inswinger that thumps his front leg. What a start that is. 146kph from Gabriel and Tamim is caught halfway into his stride across
length ball headed for the top of off. Anxious prod to get it down to fine leg off the inside half of the bat
shot! Short ball outside off and his arms move smoothly under it as he chops it over gully
short ball in the corridor, defended confidently on the back foot
full ball outside off, mistimed drive towards point. Spliced off the outside half, his feet were stuck in the crease
nicely timed. Liton looks in a good mood. Length ball angled in at off stump and he punches it firmly back down the pitch. Bowler stops with his right boot
130kph, length ball fired down leg side
129kph, short ball into the chest. Gets on top of the bounce and glances to fine leg with the angle
nice outswinger on a length but a tad too wide outside off to make him play
length ball jags away off the surface, but too far outside to make him play again
short of a length outswinger outside off, left alone with the bat withdrawn

glorious. Beautiful follow through from Liton on this extra cover drive. It's full and floated up outside off. Doesn't need his feet to get near this one because it's full. High elbow and a flowing drive, through the line
full outside off, driven out to the covers
short of a length, sees it angling in closer to him and keeps the bat inside the line
short of a length, well wide of him this time as he keeps his bat inside
that's plumb! Or is it? Could have been an inside edge, it seems. Height too a bit of a factor. Hit him in front of middle after cutting in from a short of a length
full, driven through cover
short of good length, arches back and leaves
short of a length, angled across, keeps his bat inside
short and wide, punched to point
length on leg stump, rolls into the leg side off the pad. And he's overstepped
good length on middle, defended back
back of a length, sprayed down the leg side
back of a length on middle, defended
fullish, angling in on off, defended
clipped off the pads with the angle to deep backward square leg
short of a length, angles in late, no stroke offered
good length on off, blocked into the off side
ah, lovely! Fired in that channel outside off and getting it to rip away off a short of a length to beat the outside edge
short of a length, angles in and hits the pad as he misses the flick
back of a length, angles away, left alone
beautiful bowling. Swinging it away from him after making him reach out. Loose, extravagant push away from the body gets him beaten
length on middle, flicked into the leg side
full outside off, gets away from him late and he ends up driving uppishly through the covers
short of a length, opens the face through backward point
full on the pads, flicked uppishly over the midwicket region
short of a length, angles in late and left alone
short of a length, angled in, gets hit on the pad as he tries to nudge it into the on side

Gabriel belts out an appeal and S Ravi upholds the appeal. Pretty plumb. Good stuff from the big fast bowler. Angles in a length ball from wide of the crease and tempts him to flick across the line. Fails to put bat to ball and gets pinned in front of middle and leg
length ball outside off, goes past the bat hanging outside off
that's two now. Double strike from Gabriel. Mominul does not learn from the previous dismissal and attempts to close the face against the angle to get a leading edge to gully. A two-ball duck
short of a length, blocked into the covers off the backfoot

Cummins strikes first ball now. Gets some subtle shape. Pitches in line, and there's some contemplation on the review. They go for it. Ah, jeez, he's going to find it hard to get this overturned. Oh, actually, it has JUST pitched outside leg stump. Tamim narrowly survives. Good review in the end. Took their time and made the right call
length, angled across on off, drilled into the covers
short of a length, tucked behind square
full on middle and leg, pushed back
full, angled across, blocked
tucked into the leg side
short of good length on off, shuffles and blocks
tries an upper cut but with no room, he doesn't make connection. But that's not the kind of shot you'd expect to see at this stage
short of a length on off, punched to cover
back of a length, angled across off, keeps it down into the off side
length on middle and off, blocked solidly into the covers
short of a length on middle, defended from the crease
gets an inside edge as he slashes at a wide one but it bounces in front of the keeper
short and angled across, crunches it off the backfoot through cover and point. Slapped with authority
clips the high part of the pad and lobs towards the cordon after pitching outside leg
punches at a wide one and gets it through the gap, so it's all fine. Back of a length, stopping on him a little and opens the face late to guide it uppishly
ah, just how much did that cut back in! Off a back of a length and just about beating the edge though he had his bat inside the line and going over off stump
length, cuts in, turned into the leg side
length, angled in, opens the face to guide to point
short of a length, cuts in, tucked with the angle to backward square leg
short of a length, shifts back and blocks in front of off
flicked off the hips from a leg stump line to square leg
length, tries to flick and gets hit on the glove
crunched! A sweet, crisp drive through the covers as Cummins offers up length and width
some more intent from Shakib. Length ball outside off, opens up and sends it screaming through extra cover
short of a length, cuts in and hits him high on the pad. Would've missed leg too
back of a length, shifts back and blocks
another extravagant shot attempted but there's vast gaps in the outfield there so he's fine. Comes down the ground and launches this over mid-off
defends a length ball that keeps a little low from the crease
turn and bounce, nearly shaves the edge
they are really going for it now. Not sure how long this can work. Minimal control on this shot again as he comes down the track and the ball turns away and finds the outside of the bat through gully
short, spinning away, cut to point
back of a length, defended in front of middle. The bowler's overstepped
full on middle, pushed to mid-off
angled across on middle and off, drilled off the inside of the bat behind square. Another no-ball
short of a length on leg, blocked
length on middle and leg, defended
too close to cut and finds point

and...well...he follows it up with that. Short of a length ball wide outside off, and for some reason, he's tried to send that the way of the two catching midwicket fielders. beauty. Angled in and nipping away. Tamim trapped in the crease looking to feel for it and is beaten
keep it out as this length ball skids low and is in danger of sneaking into the stumps

Hasn't accounted for the swing and he's chopped it on

close. Dangerous from Mahmudullah. Like I said, he's on a middle stump guard. Still, he shuffles across. Gets the bat down very late as this length ball heads for middle stump and gets it into the leg side

won't get away this time! He's been done by his own technique adjustment. Perhaps the loose shots from the last Test have prompted him to shuffle and get close to off stump. Mahmudullah is caught on the crease while still moving across. Plumb. Bat blocked by leg, which was pressing forward and the looking to get back and really, just a big mess of his own doing.
